speaker: Doctor
text: Good morning, Mrs. Smith. I understand we have some challenges with your medication history. Can you tell me about any medications you're currently taking?

speaker: Patient
text: Well, I think I'm on something for my blood pressure, but I can't remember the name. I also take something for pain when it gets bad.

speaker: Doctor
text: Okay, do you recall how often you take the blood pressure medication or the pain medication?

speaker: Patient
text: The blood pressure one is every day, I think. The pain medication is just when I need it, maybe a couple of times a week.

speaker: Doctor
text: That helps. Since we're not sure about the exact medications, would you be open to starting a new blood pressure medication that we can monitor closely?

speaker: Patient
text: Yes, that sounds good. I just want to make sure my blood pressure stays under control.
